aboutMe.name: Sitora Qodirova
aboutMe.description: Hey, my name is Sitora Qodirova, I was born on 09.10.2001. Currently, I am studying at the Faculty of Law of Jizzakh region.
aboutMe.description2: My goal is to raise legal culture and legal awareness in society and provide free legal assistance to citizens.
